alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:56PM CST until January 01 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN UNION...WESTERN TIPPAH AND SOUTHERN BENTON COUNTIES... At 255 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gravestown, or 13 miles west of Ripley, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Blue Mountain, Gravestown, Hickory Flat, Ashland, Potts Camp, Falkner, Murry, Winborn, Spring Hill, Whitten Town, Pine Grove, Hamilton and Bethel. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
